<<<<<<< HEAD
Tvvo soveraigne salves for the soules sicknesse deliuered in certaine sermons at Hurst-church in the county of Berkes, neere Reading. By Robert Lovell, then minister and preacher of Gods word in the same parish. Lovell, Robert, curate of Allhallows, Barking.
[10], 36 p.
Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sould at the signe of the starre vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Ally, London : 1621.
Printer's name from STC. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Printed by T. S[nodham] for Nathanael Newbery, and are to be sould at the signe of the starre vnder St. Peters Church in Cornehill, and in Popes-head Ally, London : 1621.
